page.title: 08CHURCH LIFE.
page.content: CHURCH OF ENGLAND (ST.EBBA) Vicar of the parish is Rev.W Waddle who also is Rural Dean. The average attendance is 24 in morning & 18 at night,in winter 14. Church kneelers worked by ladies of the village,beautifully made tapestries designed by Miss Kathleen Parbury, a sculptress who lives in Beadnell. Finance now is a main worry as costs of repair so prohibitive & each year finding the money for expenses of day to day running is a drain on resources. Money - making efforts this year have been Fete which made Â£1406. Jumble Sale,coffee evenings & pie & pea supper for funds.
